skill.name: internal-comms
skill.description: A set of resources to help me write all kinds of internal communications, using the formats that my company likes to use. Claude should use this skill whenever asked to write some sort of internal communications (status reports, leadership updates, 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, incident reports, project updates, etc.).
skill.summary: A set of resources to help me write all kinds of internal communications, using the formats that my ...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: Official Anthropic skill containing only markdown documentation files. No scripts, executables, network calls, or filesystem operations.

content.value_statement: Creating consistent internal communications takes time and requires the right format for each situation. This skill provides templates and guidelines for writing 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, and other internal messages.
actual_capabilities: Write 3P (Progress, Plans, Problems) updates for teams and executives
Create company-wide newsletters with 20-25 bullet points organized by category
Generate FAQ responses from common employee questions
Write general internal communications with proper audience and tone
Format updates with appropriate emojis and structured sections
limitations: Does not connect to external APIs to fetch data automatically
Requires user to provide team updates, metrics, and content
Output is plain text only, no native image or media generation
User must verify accuracy of all information before sending

use_cases.title: Weekly Team Updates
use_cases.description: Summarize weekly progress, upcoming plans, and blockers for executive review.

use_cases.title: Company Newsletters
use_cases.description: Create monthly company-wide newsletters highlighting announcements and milestones.

use_cases.title: FAQ Summaries
use_cases.description: Compile and answer frequently asked questions across the organization.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Newsletter
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a company newsletter for December highlighting major announcements, progress on key priorities, and leadership updates.

prompt_templates.title: 3P Team Update
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a 3P update for the engineering team covering this week's achievements, next week's priorities, and any blockers.

prompt_templates.title: FAQ Compilation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an FAQ document answering the top 5 questions employees have asked about our new remote work policy.

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive Summary
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a comprehensive internal communication package including a 3P update for Q4, a FAQ section about the new benefits program, and a general announcement about the upcoming company event.

output_examples.input: Write a 3P update for the marketing team
output: Progress: Launched 3 new campaign assets, increased email open rates by 15%, completed brand guidelines update
Plans: Begin Q1 planning, finalize influencer partnerships, start social media calendar for product launch
Problems: Design resource constraints, waiting on legal review for partner contracts

best_practices: Keep updates concise with 1-3 sentences per section for 3P updates
Gather information from multiple sources like Slack, email, and documents before writing
Match the tone and format to your company's existing communication style
anti_patterns: Writing long paragraphs instead of bullet points in newsletters
Using the wrong format for the audience (e.g., detailed 3P for all-company announcements)
Including unverified information or speculation without clear disclaimers

faq.question: What AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: The skill works with Claude Code, Claude, and other Anthropic AI products. It provides templates that work across all platforms.

faq.question: What formats are supported?
faq.answer: Supported formats include 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQ documents, status reports, incident reports, and general communications.

faq.question: Does this skill access my company data?
faq.answer: The skill itself does not access data. It guides Claude to ask you for information or use available tools you have connected.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes. You can modify the example files in the examples/ directory to match your company's specific formatting preferences.

faq.question: Is my data kept private?
faq.answer: Your data remains within your Claude session. Nothing is sent to external servers beyond normal AI processing.

faq.question: How is this different from general writing skills?
faq.answer: This skill focuses specifically on internal business formats with strict structural guidelines for team and company communications.
